items.sentence: You aren't satisfied with these results, are you?
You aren't permitted to do that anymore, are you?
You aren't going to the party like that, are you?
I'm hoping that you'll stay for a couple of days.
The camera zoomed in for a closeup of Tom's face.
Tom wasn't at the meeting. I wonder where he was.
Tom isn't studying French. He's studying English.
Tom was the one who told Mary she had to do that.
That, of course, was what we were supposed to do.
Bill is still a legendary figure in this company.
The archaeologist found the entrance to the tomb.
Tom went out for a walk after it stopped raining.
Except for the storm, I would've arrived earlier.
I haven't drunk anything in the past three hours.
Do you really keep all your money under your bed?
I've been living with my parents for a long time.
Tom asked if he could have another glass of wine.
Why don't you ask Tom if he'd like to go with us?
Let's not do anything that might cause a problem.
Tom has already told Mary what she needs to know.
